fn.p: Edited by: Kalliope K. Papadopoulou, University of Thessaly, Greece
Reviewed by: Evdokia Syranidou, Technical University of Crete, Greece; Erica Lumini, Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection, National Research Council (CNR), Italy
This article was submitted to Plant Symbiotic Interactions, a section of the journal Frontiers in Plant Science
